Class XMLManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • XMLManager

  • public class XMLManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the xQueries on the misses.xml file.

        This method given some parameters returns a Node parameter obtained by an xquery
        Parameters:

        LastName - this is the last name of the person we are looking for

                                                           org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                                           java.io.IOException,
                                                           javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException
        This method given a selection string performs an xquery that returns all matching people
        Parameters:
        selection - is the string which contain the selection parameter on which is based the xquery
        Returns:
        the nodelist of matching people
